law.history: Repealed 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 381, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 155, sec. 85, effective June 17, 1978; and ch. 384, sec. 567, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 116; and ch. 172, sec. 1. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 244, Art. III, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4377-2, 4377-4, 4384-5, 4527-63.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: State Board for Elementary and Secondary Education -- Members -- Compensation -- Function.
